I once worked in  Florida. The Gypsies are 2 groups of Rom who would come into town after rotating a couple years till the heat was off. The first were the American Rom, long separated from Europe, and do goods and services cons. The European Rom, who may or may not return to Europe and then come back, were brutal and aggressive. They'd break into "snowbird" homes, and rob and steal when people went back north for the summer. What should we now call these moths? How bout the "Steal you blind or break and enter moths?"
